subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Jozy Altidore hit his stride Saturday with two goals against Nigeria as the United States men’s national team completed a sweep of three exhibitions before the World Cup.
snippet: Jozy Altidore hit his stride Saturday with two goals against Nigeria as the United States men’s national team completed a sweep of three exhibitions before the World Cup.
